title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush returns! Seattle radicals change occupied zone name from CHAZ to CHOP. Calm down, everybody, you're not alone. Democrat-run cities with black mayors and black police chiefs still have racism. Why America is not a white supremacist nation. Christians going to church, hearing preaching about white privilege, reparations. What would happen if armed right-wingers took over six blocks of a city? No pushback from elected Republicans, ordinary citizens to the assault on America. People with guns always brag radicals won't be able to take over America because of them. Well, where are they? We're fighting a cultural war, not an ideological, political one, but there is a political tie to the Democrat Party. HBO Max removes Gone with the Wind, DVD surges to #1 on Amazon. 800,000 sign up for Trump rally in Tulsa. Coronavirus stays away from Democrat protests, but media tells us the virus will spread at Trump rally. The Trump base is pushing back in their own ways. Trump West Point speech is blueprint for themes of reelection. People fleeing New York and Minneapolis in droves. Rush not calling for armed pushback.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Rush thanks guest hosts. No coronavirus at huge protests, but Trump rally is a danger? Trump's strategy on unrest in Democrat-run cities. Bloomberg columnist on what Rush will talk about if Trump's not reelected. Defund the police is huge gift to Trump campaign. Leftists look at racism as a virus? NFL players with COVID-19 in Texas. NFL players say kneeling has nothing to do with the flag or anthem. Texans coach says he will kneel. Mother: I'm leaving Seattle because I'm not willing to die to fight radical leftists. Trump supporter afraid to fly Trump flag. Liberals burning flags flying at private homes, cops unsure of motive. Totalitarian Marxists saw how easy it was to shut us down and keep us inside. What will we do when they try it again? Trump's speech at West Point.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Philadelphia city officials denounce group defending Columbus. Liberals will do anything to get rid of Donald Trump, including undermine rule of law, destroy economy. Trump's West Point speech contains themes he should repeat in every speech, press conference. Houston cancels 4th of July celebration. Biden says Trump will try to steal the election, won't leave office if he loses. Moment of silence for George Floyd at Charles Schwab Challenge. Chairman of Joint Chiefs Milley says he was wrong to participate in St. John's Church photo-op. Ric Grenell: Trump is breaking the system in Washington.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
